price: Göklerde ve yerde olanlar Allah’ı tesbih ederler. O; Aziz'dir, Hakim'dir.
arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: sabbaḥa lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
